Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: I am interested to hear from the community about what they think of this: BTCH does a hard-fork to a larger supply (to be determined) so that it can enable mining as well as cryptoconditions, and whatever else good stuff is available now in asset chains

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: So, one theoretical scenario is BTCH forks to double it's supply (Satoshi's double vision) to 42M coins, and we make all the remaining 21M mineable via equihash. At the same time, we enable cryptoconditions so that BTCH can do all this cool smart contract stuff that James has been working on

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: Doubling our supply does "dilute" current HODLers position, but if making BTCH minable + CC can more than double the price, it seems worth it. And since our price is so low right now, I could easily see this BTCH revival doing much more than a 2X.

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: if BTCH had mining pools and all the culture/community that comes with mining, it probably would give us way better liquidity

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: because miners will always want to sell, and traders will always want to speculate

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: I am sure some people will not like the above ideas, but I think doing nothing is worse. It would be cool to mine BTCH on a z9

Author: Berg#2666
Content: BTCH needs a revival, and I am 100% on board for this first step being taken. We'll have to peddle it around the community for further ideas, but this seems like the best way to get the ball rolling.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: I will support anything the community will want to do

Author: xRobeSx#5136
Content: I think a mineable BTCH is a great idea

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: it seems that the downside risk is very small, and the upside is potentially very large

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: so it seems we need to decide on specifics, like a new supply, and what the schedule for halving/etc will be

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: the cryptoconditions part is easy, we just use `ac_cc=1` when creating the chain.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: make it ac_cc=2

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: i think the biggest decision is how to change our supply

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: oh, i wasn't sure what that did actually

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: then it can be an oracle for cross chain usage

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: sounds great

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: ie. if BTCH store BTC Headers (see what i did) all the other chains can use that to verify BTC transactions

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: awesome

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: Doubling our supply and making all the new supply mineable seems to be one of the simpler possibilities, i am not sure about how the mining schedule should work tho

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: BTCH was before AC's had mining and i haven't looked at all the mining options currently available when creating an AC

Author: Alright#0419
Content: I propose an initial supply of 2.1M, total supply stays 21M

Author: Alright#0419
Content: take a decimal place off of everyone's balance

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: @Alright we can play all kinds of games like that, but makes the process more complex/edge cases/etc. With those numbers, you are allowing 90% to be mined, that is current HODLers being diluted to 10% of what they had

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: and what about addresses with 1-9 satoshis?

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: there are a hell of a lot of them, lol

Author: Alright#0419
Content: you won't attract many new miners if their mining efforts are dwarfed by the premine

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: this is good feedback, i think we want to find a happy middle ground between people who currently hold BTCH and future miners

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: @Alright if it's profitable as hell for them to mine BTCH on their z9's, does that really matter?

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: a lot of BTCH is locked up in addresses from lost/deleted/gone BTC, there is actually a lot of BTCH that will never be used because of that

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: there isn't some big pre-mine, there is none actually

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: the currently supply of BTCH is, in theory, 21M, but taking into account all lost BTC, it is more like 15M most likely

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: "accessible supply" or whatever

Author: Alright#0419
Content: if the purpose is to attract miners, I think you should make the current supply much less than the overall supply

Author: Alright#0419
Content: 50% is a lot, just saying

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: I wonder what current HODLers think of that

Author: Alright#0419
Content: You've heard from at least 1 üòõ

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: if some BTCH HODLer knows they own 1% of BTCH supply and then we do this 90/10 as you suggest, they now own 0.1% of BTCH supply
